TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventHubRetryPolicy extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An abstract representation of a policy to govern retrying of messaging operations.
Docs.remarks: It is recommended that developers without advanced needs not implement custom retry policies but instead configure the default policy by specifying the desired set of retry options when creating one of the Event Hubs clients.

Public MustOverride Function CalculateRetryDelay (lastException As Exception, attemptCount As Integer) As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
abstract member CalculateRetryDelay : Exception * int -> Nullable<TimeSpan>

Docs.param: The last exception that was observed for the operation to be retried.
The number of total attempts that have been made, including the initial attempt before any retries.
Docs.summary: Calculates the amount of time to wait before another attempt should be made.
Docs.returns: The amount of time to delay before retrying the associated operation; if null, then the operation is no longer eligible to be retried.

Docs.param: The number of total attempts that have been made, including the initial attempt before any retries.
Docs.summary: Calculates the amount of time to allow the current attempt for an operation to complete before considering it to be timed out.
Docs.returns: The amount of time to allow for an operation to complete.
